title: Drawing, "Design for a Rug with Circles in Squares"
medium: Pastel, graphite on white wove paper
dimensions: 35.9 x 27.3 cm (14 1/8 x 10 3/4 in. ), irregular sheet
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Rectangular field divided into squares, four across and six down in (from top to bottom) green, olive, grown, wine.  In each square, colored circles with colored dots in middle.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for a Rug with Circles in Squares".Pastel, graphite on white wove paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-61.
